article_title: House finance panel’s chief, Rep. Ryan Smith seeks focus on poverty
article_text:
Total Access

article_metadata.description: Rep. Ryan Smith does not talk about education, taxes and Medicaid in the same tone as a number of his fellow House Republicans. It’s no coincidence that the new chairman of the powerful House Finance Committee comes from a district that doesn’t look like those represented by many of his GOP colleagues.
